0011111101011011 0000100101111101 0 -> sum: 0100100011011000, cout: 0

1010100100111111 1001111100111111 1 -> sum: 0100100001111111, cout: 1
0011010011111110 0001001111100000 0 -> sum: 0100100011011110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
